page.title: 15CONVERSATION (TRANSLATION).
page.content: Two old ladies who used to work in the fishing industry had been sitting for two hours talking about filleting fish when they were children.I over heard them say that they used to work from five in the morning to eight at night.I stopped to listen. They worked at Fraserburgh until they were moved to Aberdeen.One of the ladies was once out at sea when a giant whale collided with the trawler which nearly overturned,& they almost drowned.The other one said that she had just had a hot cup of tea and an oatcake with cheese and it was delic- ious."What is the time? one asked.It must be getting late.Do you want to come to my house for a Burn's Supper? We'll have haggis turnips,potatoes, oatmeal stuffing & a small whisky." "That would be nice." "I'll see you at seven."Off they went.
